title: RACING SESSION detail page Â» SESSION RESULTS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all SESSION RESULTS for a RACING SESSION\
So I can find out who performed well and who not
description:
* The RACING SESSION detail page contains a section with a list of all connected SESSION RESULTS.
* Each SESSION RESULT in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each SESSION RESULT in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each SESSION RESULT in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no SESSION RESULT connected to the RACING SESSION then the section is not displayed at all.
